revised_title: Account of an Infant Musician: The Extraordinary Musical Talents of William Crotch
tldr: The article narrates the story of William Crotch, a child prodigy who displayed remarkable musical talents at a young age. Born in 1775, Crotch began showing interest in music at 18 months old and was able to play simple tunes on the organ by the age of two. His unique abilities sparked curiosity and interest in his early musical development and the role of music in human development.
